ğŸš€ In this video, we're unveiling Adaâ€”an ALWAYS ON Personal AI Assistant that's designed to help engineers focused on shipping code. Powered by DeepSeek V3 and local, opensource, real-time speech-to-text (STT), this version of Ada can take your productivity to the next level.

ğŸ§  Discover how leveraging an always-on compute system like Ada can supercharge your engineering workflow. We'll dive deep into the three essential elements of a personal AI assistant:

- Ears (NEAR Real-Time STT): Utilizing the POWERFUL LOCAL STT library for real-time speech-to-text, Ada listens continuously, ready to execute your commands.
- Brain (DeepSeek V3): With DeepSeek's advanced AI agent capabilities, Ada understands and processes your requests efficiently.
- Voice (ElevenLabs): Experience seamless interaction with Ada's natural-sounding voice powered by ElevenLabs.

ğŸ’¡ We'll explore the innovative 'Scratch Pad' pattern that gives Ada active memory, allowing for more dynamic and context-aware interactions. See firsthand how Ada executes complex commands, manages tasks, and integrates seamlessly with the Typer CLI agent to boost your productivity.
